name: Boxcar Brats
description:
Boxcar Brats is a wacky, top-down, multiplayer, "anti-racing" game.  Your box car is out of control, so do everything you can do stay in last place!  Swerve, skid and smash everything in sight to build up your brake meter and spin out your opponents!  So hop into your boxcar, cause some mayhem and eliminate your buddies - nothing is off limits when you're a brat!

Programming - Kenneth Yeung

Art - Mike Nguyen, Vic Nguyen

Level Design - Carmen Szeto

Music - Incompetech.com

Created at Toronto Game Jam 2014
